column1: Can't believe this needs to be said if you test positive for COVID do not go to a fundraiser do not go to to an Oktoberfest dinner and definitely don't visit hospital patients. https://t.co/XoNE6Kjdca

No person should have to suffer from COVID. To the Trump family @WhiteHouse staff Secret Service I wish you good health and a speedy recovery. This virus doesn't care about where you live or who you support. https://t.co/8vOSeVl5mD

While we're at it the president has also refused: -to condemn white supremacy in Charlottesville -to demand bad actors stop meddling in our elections  -to address Russian bounties on American troops  -to tell the truth about COVID -to commit to a peaceful transition of power https://t.co/j4ZOtUfMAx

As millions mourn 200k dead and the economy reels someone says:  "It affects virtually no one."  Would you think they're: (A) dammingly misinformed  (B) delusional (C) devoid of compassion (D) the person who should be in charge of fighting Covid and rebuilding the country https://t.co/xarAkGzTDi

After knowing about the deadliness. After lying about the deadlines. After millions of people wore masks stayed home and social distanced you decided to spit on their efforts. What's more is the silence from the @GOP is deafening. https://t.co/iR8GhLuj7q

Covid is killing Americans. Millions struggle to pay bills.  People in the streets demanding equality and justice. Foreign enemies attack our democracy. Attorney General unable to condemn calls to vote twice.   @realDonaldTrump is riffing on straws and discouraging masks.
Nearly 140000 Americans are dead from the Coronavirus and @realDonaldTrump is on a self-important rant in the Rose Garden.  Americans deserve better.
